channel.title: Screens on Error States
channel.description: Recent content in Screens on Error States

item.title: 026 - At The Airport
item.description: I spent a surprisingly large amount of 2021 flying around from place to place, despite Covid being still a very real and present thing. Being in airports was a strange experience – despite every sign and precaution telling you to avoid crowding and to keep six feet of distance, you were constantly packed like sardines into air trains and walkways and in waiting areas on the flights themselves. Masks were often surprisingly hard to find, despite every sign telling you to mask up.

item.title: 008 - Subways Beta
item.description: What happens when you introduce agile software development into rolling out public digital infrastructure? [Continue Reading]
